participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.background: I tend to be a little obsessive with my cleaning habits. My father used to drive a taxi cab in the 1970s. I am getting married next week. I enjoy hiking with my horses and eating ginger snaps along the way. I need a space where I can be creative and have room for my art supplies.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous, caring, and savvy with finances.
participant_2.background: I'm a fast driver in my red car. I have a pet lizard named Gila. I would like to go to school to become a veterinarian. I take care of my mother and father. I love to save money.

content.text: I am getting married next week, how exciting!
Wow! Congratulations! Do you have a theme?
It is going to be a casual wedding at the beach.
Sounds wonderful, I love the beach.
My dad used to drive a taxi cab in the 70's, he was a real character.
That's really cool, I love hearing about people's parents.
I do too, they are both such hard workers.
Me too, my parents work hard to take care of me and my brother.
I need a space where I can be creative and have room for my art supplies.
I love to create things, I like to make jewelry.
That's really cool, do you sell it?
Yes, I sell it on Etsy, I love it!
